lines.text: Clear the dock! Clear the dock!
So, behind these gates is buried the legend of a mortal who went beyond the realm of human powers and tampered with things no man should ever touch.
Most elements are traceable to glandular disorders.

[referring to the new shipment of lions]
How many?
Well, I'll feed 'em, but you gotta explain meatless Tuesdays to 'em.

[drunkenly to Dr. Walters in a bar]
Now, how about us havin' a little drink, enh? A little drink to monkey business.

[rhetorical]
Why should a single life be so important?

[ominously to Beth]
You're not only going to watch this operation... You're going to be helpful to me.
Gee, it's good having you back. Was the trip a success?
A success? Look! "Look! Twenty tigers, twenty lions, six zebras, eleven leopards... and Sheila!"
The most gorgeous lady that ever came out of the jungles.
